Topic.Title: Could Trayvon Have Stood His Ground? That's a legitimate question.

Message.Msg: Why not educate yourself with the legal facts, moron? Over a year earlier a black man shot a white man in front of the white ma's daughter, cited "stand your ground" and was not charged until the backlash from Zimmerman being charged. In that case the evidence did indicate second degree murder. The white man's offnse? Defending skateboarders and approaching the black man in what the black man considered a threatening manner. The black man likely would have never been charged but for the Zimmerman case, he got manslaughter. Either party has the right to stand. Zimmerman and Martin were within teir rights until the first punch was thrown, that escalated the incident to assault. Legally it doesn't even matter who threw the first punch in the "stand your ground case". When it further escalated to one party having the upper hand in the fight and continuing to the point of the other fearing for his life it was an unfortunate hard lesson for a juvenile mistake. And BTW, idiot, like the 10th time, this was not a "stand your ground" case. Something that appears to escape you, your racist President and dolt AG.

Message.Title: Jurors discussed Florida's Stand Your Ground law before rendering their not-guilty verdict
Message.Msg: By MARC CAPUTO | The Miami Herald MIAMI — Jurors discussed Florida's controversial Stand Your Ground self-defense law before rendering their not-guilty verdict in George Zimmerman's trial, one of the jurors told CNN's Anderson Cooper. The jurors struggled with the law and the jury instructions, said the juror, who spoke anonymously and was identified only by her court ID, B37. "The law became very confusing. It became very confusing," she told Cooper Monday night. "We had stuff thrown at us. We had the second-degree murder charge, the manslaughter charge, then we had self defense, Stand Your Ground."

Message.Title: 40th time, not a "STAND YOUR GROUND" case, but the reason for stand your ground
Message.Msg: is that, depending on circumstances, it can be far more dangerous to flee an attacker than to stand and defend yourself. Now the rallies and the vigils should maybe be calling for better definitions of when "stand your ground" applies, but in this case Zimmermen was returning to his car when attacked, there was no ground to stand, he WAS retreating, thus "stand your ground" was not invoked by the defense as the justification.

Topic.Title: The combination of smart phone and desktop/laptop is better choice than the tablet IMO

Message.Msg: Thought it was just me! I hated my tablet, sent it back. It did nothing for me. It was sort of convenient but not really, I hated having to hold it up, it was too big and too heavy to do anything for any length of time. And as long as I had to put it down to use it, I wanted the versatility of a real computer. And if I want to watch a movie and I'm home, I'll put it on my big screen tv, although I do like watching small. intimate tv shows from my computer screen. The closeness to the screen is a different experience than the the TV and one that I liked. I'm going to wait until the fall and buy a hybrid that is really a computer when you want it and a tablet if you want it.

Topic.Title: Lenovo Surface with Windows 8 is outstanding

Message.Msg: How it compares to the Pro: The Surface Pro and the IdeaPad Yoga 13 have a lot in common on paper, especially if you can get by with the Yoga's Core i3 processor. The choice basically boils down to a matter of preference. Would you like a tablet that can be a laptop (the Surface Pro) or a laptop that can be a tablet (the Yoga)? The IdeaPad Yoga's superb keyboard and touchpad may be the decision maker for people who spend the day banging away at productivity-focused tasks.

The downside is minimal….check it for yourself. SYNC HIGHLIGHTS: - Profitable - Strong balance sheet with $1.5/share cash and tiny $3.5M long term debt - Provides an array of new technologies and expects to launch many more this year and in 2014 per the last Q CC/transcript - Opening a new engineering office in Boston to tap top talent - Significant recent deal with Verizon and Google - Global expansion with Toshiba in the works per recent Investor's presentation - Huge short position to cover in 9 trading days – Potential massive short squeeze - Insiders are buying significant chunks or stock at current prices - Small float - Currently trading at a 70% discount compared to sector averages ABOUT SYNC: Synacor's white-label platform enables cable, satellite, telecom and consumer electronics companies to deliver TV Everywhere, digital entertainment, cloud-based services and apps to their end-consumers across multiple devices, strengthening those relationships while monetizing the engagement. Topic.Title: So Nokia is MSFt's only asset in mobile

Message.Msg: Microsoft does not keep up with updating their WP8 to meet the competitors - iOS and Android. For example, they do not offer HD+ screen resolution, quad core support, 802.11ac, USB 3.0; on the software end; they do not care too much about having micro SD cards be able to store and read WP8 apps. It can only store stuff like music files but no apps or mapping data yet like Android can do with their micro SD card and OS.
